item.title: How to update git submodules
item.description: In your git repository you can have one or multiple others git repositories as submodule. To add a git repository as a submodule, use the following command: git submodule add <submodule git url> <local path to the submodule repository> To update all of the submodules, issues the following command: version >= 1.8.2 git submodule update --recursive --remote version >= 1.7.3 git submodule update --recursive or git pull --recurse-submodules Note: In case the repository is checked out for the first time, the --init option has to be used.

item.title: How to change the author of git commit
item.description: To change the author of a git commit, do the following: git rebase -i <commit-hash> git commit --amend --author="name <email@mail.com>" git rebase --continue

item.title: Create post with hugo
item.description: To create a post with hugo CLI, use hugo new .
